Yeah I hear quite a few statements just in the reversal. Someone could call it a coincidence of reverse speech except for one fact...it calls you by name.
   
  so this is what I heard on quick evaluation. They are attached to this email.
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          
No doubt there's more in this I'm not hearing. This is just the start fo the 
meeting that I was recording. It's kinda big, about 500K so might a while to 
down load. I had originally made this mic amp to do open air EVP recording.

Frank
